entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023
